description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Desert Hoppers is an ATV racing style game with four different campaigns. One for hopping into airborne emoticons for bonus points, another for on-track jumps for airtime points. Another for destructive track obstacles. Another for just racing with no hopping.
description.short: Desert Hoppers is an ATV racing style game with four different campaigns. One for hopping into airborne emoticons for bonus points, another for on-track jumps for airtime points. Another for destructive track obstacles. Another for just racing with no hopping.
